phrases: I walk through the white pages of my storybook
with a kaleidoscope of my experiences.
aa yawarakakute atatakai kimi no te
Your hand is so warm held within mine;
nigiri shimete sono kokoro no oku made todoku you ni
it reaches all the way to my heart.
hohoenmi de kureta nara nigirikaeshite kuretara
I cannot see a brighter future
boku wa tada mae wo miteru
than you smiling and taking my hand as well
Thank goodness you knew where Kazehaya was.
Yeah, we were just talking earlier.
I think she is still being misunderstood,
and that she is keeping more things to herself than she says out loud.
But she is trying her best, and I love that about her.
I do not want to give up either.
I want my feelings to reach him.
It is time to tell him how I...
I am sorry I made you cry.
I am sorry I put you through so much trouble.
I am sorry for saying whatever I wanted.
If you have a response to what I said though, please tell me.
I want to know, no matter what it is.
My feelings for you will not change.
But your like is different from mine.
If you are looking for Yoshida and Yano, they are probably outside.
I came because I wanted to talk to you.
It is okay just like this, so please listen.
No matter what I did, people have always apologized to me.
That is why I was so happy when we first met and you smiled and thanked me instead.
I have never treated you the same as everyone else.
But, even so, I was still happy.
It was as if everything suddenly had color to it.
Every second of every day was different because of you.
But even though it meant so much to me,
I did the exact opposite of what you did.
So this time, instead of apologizing to you, I want to say
Thank you for talking to me.
Thank you for telling me your hidden feelings.
It is so hard to put all of these feelings into words
I do not know how to say them.
I do not want you to see me right now!
I wonder if Sawako was able to tell him.
I suppose we should let them be and go home.
If you are here, raise your hand!
Ryu does not really lie though.
It is Joe he is talking to.
Do you guys know where Kuronuma is?
What do you want with her?
We will take a message for you.
I have thought of something really good.
Guess I will go check around the classroom.
Oh right, she went home already!
Then why did not you just say that earlier?
I feel like I have never had the chance to look at you face-to-face like this before.
I looked all over for you!
what do you think of having maybe seven salty and three sweet?
Girls, if you are going to make a mistake, do it on the boys' costumes!
We will do it on Joe's!
I was not able to tell him a tenth of my feelings
I am just a caring homeroom teacher.
I wanted to go over details for tomorrow's performance with Kuronuma.
I have come up with something good!
We will definitely get points for this!
Come here for a sec, Kuronuma.
Should not that be a bag of snacks for us that you are holding?
He is definitely trying to pull something again.
Look at his eyes, full of hidden desires!
I cannot look at Kazehaya without hidden desires anymore!
He said his feelings would not change but I just do not know what to do anymore!
Do you really think Shota and the others do not have hidden desires as well?
It is normal to have hidden desires!
Tomorrow, put one of these on each judge's plate.
And also, tomorrow, tell him everything you just said right now.
All of these mix-ups are annoying.
said something amazing, did not I?
Now I need to go find Shota!
I think you need more paint on that side.
We are pulling an all-niter for it.
Pin was supposedly just at the girls' place!
She said there is a Pin-vasion warning!
He really does not need to come.
I am going to use the bathroom real fast.
You know, hidden desires are part of the heart!
Shota's mind is filled with nothing but hidden desires!
That is Pin, is not it?
I came all the way over here just to give you advice!
You should be grateful and thank me!
Pin showed up at the guys' place too!
He is like yelling outside or something.
The sooner he leaves, the more help he will be!
When are you going to talk to him?
I-I will try to before the parade!
I cannot remember the last time I looked forward to tomorrow this much.
Kazehaya, what did he mean by hidden desires?
That is what I would like to know!
Seriously, Pin's messing with your business.
Joe's just been eating all night.
And when is Ryu going to get up?
I want to talk to you again.
I want to talk to you again.
douka i am about to dake wa furimukanaide
Please do not look at me right now
The sun's set, the wind's blowing,
and we are so close that we can almost touch
My gaze has always been fixed on you
I do not mind if this emotion is what they call love,
and I do not care if I get hurt by it
I just want to tell you, over and over again
If we are together, I am sure we will
If we are together, we will be even more
